FuncDef: This command configures the bandwidth available both at the interface and bundle level when a specific number of ports in a LAG group fail.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the LAG ID. When the number of ports available in the LAG link is reduced by the number of ports configured in this context then the level-id specified here must be applied.

If the number of ports available in the LAG is reduced by the number of ports configured in this command here then bandwidth allowed for bundle and/or interface will be as per the levels configured in this context. Values-1 to 64 (for 64-link LAG) 
1 to 32 (for other LAGs).
Specifies the amount of bandwidth available within a given bundle for MC traffic for a specified level.
